titles.title: A resolution congratulating the University of Florida football team for winning the 2008 Bowl Championship Series (BCS) national championship.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate with an amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 1/14/2009--Passed Senate amended. Congratulates the University of Florida Gators for winning the 2008 Bowl Championship Series (BCS) national championship.
